title: system error msg libssl-1_1.dll
body: i downloaded the new client months ago and everything worked fine. until today when i tried to play the game it came up with a error message from the LeagueClient.exe - system error saying "The program cant start because libssl-1_1.dll is missing from my computer. Try reinstalling the program to fix this problem." i uninstalled league and reainstalled it with the new client and the same message appeared. any help on how to fix this issue?

replies.body:
That missing .dll message means there's either a missing file, or that file became corrupted somehow. Since uninstalling/reinstalling hasn't fixed the issue, let's try using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with the reinstall option turned on.

Let me know if that helps!
Hi, thanks for the advice! unfortunately the Hextech Repair tool didnt work. Would i have to install the missing file from somewhere?

There may be a security setting with your OS that's blocking your game from installing every game file properly.  Reinstall the game as an Administrator in this case to resolve the issue.  If you want to use the HRT for that, you'll have to run the tool as Admin as well.  Let me know if that works for you.
im already running the game as administrator. how to do i install it as administrator?
The simplest way to do that is by right-click the icon for HRT or your install, and selecting "Run As Administrator."  Let me know if you run into any trouble.
the game works when i have the old client but it has that error message when i try and install the new client.
i have this problem now..
euw the same prblem
Same s**t right now.

> [{quoted}](name=SparkleFountain,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=U5qABZPw,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-05-12T22:36:06.750+0000)
>
> Yo, I had this same problem, but I found a solution on my own when Google or Riot Support couldn't help me! It's actually a really simple fix (oh wow). Right click your League of Legends client, go to "Open File Location" then try to open "LeagueClient.exe." Same error, right? If that's the case, delete that then open "lol.launcher.exe." Hopefully that should work~

This worked for me, hex whatever tool didn't work, reinstall didn't work, I tried clicking the lol.launcher.exe and no luck, but deleting the leagueclient.exe makes it work.. searched for like 4 days for this answer.
It works. After you delete it open lol.launcher.admin.exe. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Thank you sir.
I love you so much, <3

Yo, I had this same problem, but I found a solution on my own when Google or Riot Support couldn't help me! It's actually a really simple fix (oh wow). Right click your League of Legends client, go to "Open File Location" then try to open "LeagueClient.exe." Same error, right? If that's the case, delete that then open "lol.launcher.exe." Hopefully that should work~

If u want it to work go into ur riot games file and go into the lol file next open the RADS file and into projects and then open the League_client file and press on releases and go into the release with the highest number and when u do that search the file for libssl-1_1.dll copy and then go back to the fC:\Riot Games\League of Legends file and paste it there and then press replace file in destination and it should work
GUYS every dll file problem can be fixed really simple just copy then go to windows and system system 32 and sys64 and paste in these 3 files
